text: Gernot Jurtin (9 October 1955 – 5 December 2006) was an Austrian football striker. He had a long stay with S.K. Sturm Graz and over 100 goals. ==Career== He started his career with WSV Judenburg and went to SK Sturm Graz in 1974. In 378 matches he scored 119 goals in the league. Together with Božo Bakota he formed a dangerous striker duo. In 1980–81 he was the best scorer of the Austrian Bundesliga. Between 1979 and 1983, he played 12 times for Austria, scoring one goal. He made two appearances for them in the 1982 FIFA World Cup, against Chile and Northern Ireland. == Honours == *Austrian Bundesliga Top Goalscorer: ** 1981 == References == Category:1955 births Category:2006 deaths Category:Players of the Austrian national football team Category:Austrian footballers Category:Austrian football forwards Category:Austrian Football Bundesliga top scorers
title: Gernot Jurtin
